Scene:
The Tattooing
(Irezumi / 入墨)

Play: The Three Generations of Kamakura Shoguns (鎌倉三代記)

Production: July 1983



Narrators (Tayu):

Takemoto Midoridayū (竹本緑大夫)

Toyotake Tokutayū (豊竹十九大夫)



Shamisen Players:

Takezawa Yasaburō (see also Nozawa Kichinosuke) (竹澤弥三郎)

Nozawa Kinshi IV (野澤錦糸 (四))



Performers:

(大舅)
